response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. Given its exceptional quality and features, it's valued at $15,000 to us. Considering its worth to you stands at $8,000, we're offering it to you today at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is an exclusive opportunity tailored to make sure you benefit from its value while ensuring we receive a fair return for our investment. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations or if you have any further questions.", "product_price": 12000}
